page.title: 19A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: My name is Steven Dinning and I live in Billingborough, Lincolnshire. On Monday I get up at 8 o'clock and have my breakfast. I get on my bike and ride to school. At school I play football which is 22 people running about kicking a round piece of leather filled with air trying to get it into a large net called a goal. At home I watch our video which is a machine that plays films from a tape. Saturday is my favourite day of the week. I play with my friend Kevin Kitchen. We go for a bike ride, then play with our cars. At dinner I have baked beans and something such as beefburgers, bread or fried egg. After dinner I go out to play again until it is time for my tea. I like to watch television before I go to bed.
